Workflow.Name: Scenario status based on Ready to Submit field
Workflow.Description: If user sets to Ready to Submit, status is set to Submitted. If user goes back to Save as Draft and current status is Submitted, the status is returned to Draft

LocalizedName.description: Scenario status based on Ready to Submit field

Description.description: If user sets to Ready to Submit, status is set to Submitted. If user goes back to Save as Draft and current status is Submitted, the status is returned to Draft
